name: Revenge of the Flying Dutchman Remake
name_original: Revenge of the Flying Dutchman Remake
description: SpongeBob SquarePants is on a quest to find the Flying Dutchman's treasure, and you control him in this classic side scrolling platformer. Only two levels are complete so far, but more will be added soon! All characters are owned by Nickelodeon and this is just a fan project to recreate one of their better handheld games.
